speakers.name: Calvin Cheah
speakers.bio: Calvin trained as an engineer at Queens' College, Cambridge, going on to work in various technology start-ups, most recently, Congenica Ltd, where he served as Senior Web Developer and UX Consultant, developing diagnostic tools currently deployed by Genomics England, New York Genome Centre and BGI.
speakers.subtitle: Laboratory Informatics Developer at MRC Cancer Unit
